content:
Today I chose PR 8196 for discussion!

feat(topology/{extremally_disconnected, stone_cech.lean}): introduce extremally_disconnected class of topological spaces
Created by @damiano (@adomani) on 2021-07-05
Labels: WIP, awaiting-author

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
I'm pretty sure that either mathlib or LTE has this (@Adam Topaz ?)

I think this code came from this old repo
https://github.com/ImperialCollegeLondon/condensed-sets

In any case, for the purposes of LTE, I think we decided that we will not need this characterization of extremally disconnected sets, and that using [projective X] for X : Profinite will suffice.
oh I misread this as an issue

Today I chose PR 8196 for discussion!
